item.title: I try to draw a K8s Diagram
item.description:
I found it overwhelming when start working with K8s. Event when I have used Docker for years. K8s has bunch of object types and many many configuration to know and remember but you just can’t learn them by heart. Therefore I decided to organize my understanding of K8s into something, anything. Only by trying to visualize it, my brain can start linking all the documents I have read so far into a bigger picture.
And here’s the result.
